Creator Agreement

Last Updated: October 2, 2025

1. Introduction

This Creator Agreement ("Agreement") governs the relationship between LaunchPad Market ("Platform", "we", "us", or "our") and creators ("Creator", "you", or "your") who use our platform to pitch and fund innovative product ideas.

2. Acceptance of Terms

By creating a project on LaunchPad Market, you agree to be bound by this Agreement and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use our platform as a creator.

3. Creator Responsibilities

Project Creation

As a creator, you are responsible for:

  • Creating accurate and complete project descriptions
  • Providing realistic funding goals and timelines
  • Setting fair and competitive pricing for your products
  • Creating compelling visual content to showcase your product
  • Responding to backer questions and comments in a timely manner
  • Maintaining regular communication with backers throughout the process

Product Development

As a creator, you agree to:

  • Use best efforts to develop and deliver your product as described
  • Maintain quality standards consistent with your project description
  • Meet the delivery timeline specified in your project
  • Notify backers promptly of any delays or issues that may affect delivery
  • Provide regular updates on project progress

Intellectual Property

As a creator, you represent and warrant that:

  • You own or have the necessary rights to all content in your project
  • Your project does not infringe upon the intellectual property rights of others
  • You have obtained all necessary permissions for any third-party content used
  • You will not violate any laws or regulations in creating or delivering your product

4. Platform Fees

LaunchPad Market charges platform fees for successful projects:

  • A percentage of funds raised (currently 5%) for successfully funded projects
  • Payment processing fees (currently 2.9% + $0.30 per transaction)
  • Additional fees may apply for premium services or features
  • All fees are clearly disclosed before project creation

5. Payment Terms

Funding Success

If your project reaches its funding goal:

  • Funds will be collected from backers within 72 hours of the deadline
  • Platform fees will be deducted from the total amount raised
  • The remaining balance will be transferred to your account within 14 business days
  • You are responsible for any applicable taxes on funds received

Funding Failure

If your project does not reach its funding goal:

  • No funds will be collected from backers
  • No platform fees will be charged
  • You may relaunch your project with modifications

6. Creator Obligations

Product Delivery

Upon successful funding, you are obligated to:

  • Begin product development immediately
  • Deliver products to backers within the timeframe specified
  • Provide tracking information for shipped items
  • Resolve any issues with defective or damaged products
  • Maintain records of all transactions and communications

Communication

You agree to:

  • Send a project launch announcement to all backers
  • Provide at least one progress update per month during development
  • Notify backers immediately of any significant delays or issues
  • Respond to backer inquiries within 48 hours
  • Send a delivery notification when products are shipped

7. Platform Rights

LaunchPad Market reserves the right to:

  • Review and approve all projects before they go live
  • Remove or modify projects that violate our policies
  • Suspend or terminate creator accounts for policy violations
  • Feature or promote projects at our discretion
  • Modify platform fees with 30 days' notice

8. Disclaimers and Limitations

LaunchPad Market makes no warranties regarding:

  • The success of any project or likelihood of funding
  • The quality, safety, or legality of creator products
  • The accuracy of any project descriptions or claims
  • The ability of creators to deliver on their promises

9. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless LaunchPad Market from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from:

  • Breaches of this Agreement
  • Infringement of intellectual property rights
  • Product defects or failures
  • Failure to deliver products as promised
  • Violations of applicable laws or regulations

10. Termination

Either party may terminate this Agreement:

  • With 30 days' written notice for any reason
  • Immediately for material breaches of this Agreement
  • Upon project completion and final payment

11. Dispute Resolution

Any disputes arising under this Agreement shall be resolved through:

  • Good faith negotiation between the parties
  • Mediation if negotiation is unsuccessful
  • Binding arbitration if mediation fails

12. Governing Law

This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

13. Entire Agreement

This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior agreements or understandings, whether written or oral.

14. Contact Information

For questions about this Creator Agreement, please contact us at creators@launchpadmarket.com.
